div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 898 Sumen (formerly Kolarovgrad), Bul- garia, 1941 Burial: c. 120 B.C. (Price) Contents: 62+ AR Alexander III: late post. tetradr. (Me- sembria 48, Odessus 13) Thasos: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Varna 33; Sofia 10; private coll. Sumen 5 Gerasimov, BIAB 15 (1946), p. 238; â€ BullSoc- ArchVarna 10 (1956), pp. 65-78, illus. Price, NC 1968, p. 7 f.
